fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel

Class IndexedCacheKernel<S,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<S>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.IndexedCacheKernel<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The datatype of key (usually String or Integer)
    T - The data type of input space
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class IndexedCacheKernel<S,T>
extends Kernel<S>

    Simple method of pair for caching a kernel function.

    A unique Key is assigned to each sample, and similarities between two samples are cached in Hashmaps using the keys.
    Warning: Safety granted by assertion. Disable assertion for a faster but riskier execution.

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
